title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and choosing the "Add Javadoc" option from the context menu, nothing happens. Currently, the menu appears to be non-functional. Either the menu should be removed entirely or (preferably) selecting this option should add Javadoc to the selected field.
EB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and choosing the "Add Javadoc" option from the context menu, Javadoc should be added to the selected field.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Type Hierarchy view.
2. Select a field in the view.
3. Right-click on the field to open the context menu.
4. Choose the "Add Javadoc" option from the menu.
